name: 曾恕銘
objective:
This course covers the basics and latest developments in information and communication technology (ICT), including Part I multimedia communications and networks, and Part II Introduction to Generative AI
本課程涵蓋資訊和通訊技術（ICT）的基礎知識和最新發展，包括第一部分多媒體通訊和網路，第二部分生成式人工智
schedule:
Part I multimedia communications and networs 多媒體通訊和網路
● Network Protocols (Internet layer 1-5)
● IT  source coding for video standards (Huffman code etcm layer 5.)
● Information theory and channel coding introduction (layer 1)
● Convolutional/RS codes for 4G control channel
● LDPC codes/Polar codes for 5G
● Multiple access protocols in layer 2 (CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS for Wi-Fi etc.) (optional)
● Error resilience in wireless video transmission (HARQ (RCPC+CRC), MDC, Cross-layer control, optimization theory (including linear programming))

Part II  Generative AI 生成式人工智
● Generative AI universal
●  prompt engineering
● LLMtraining
● T in ChatGPT transformer intro
● Generative AI generationstrategy
● Image Generation in Generative AI
